paper_abstract: A Z(2)Z(4)-linear Hadamard code of length alpha + 2 beta = 2(t) is a binary Hadamard code, which is the Gray map image of a Z(2)Z(4)-additive code with a binary coordinates and beta quaternary coordinates. It is known that there are exactly left perpendiculart-1/2right perpendicular and left perpendiculart/2right perpendicular nonequivalent Z(2)Z(4)-linear Hadamard codes of length 2(t), with alpha = 0 and alpha not equal 0, respectively, for all t >= 3. In this paper, it is shown that each Z(2)Z(4)-linear Hadamard code with alpha = 0 is equivalent to a Z(2)Z(4)-linear Hadamard code with alpha not equal 0, so there are only left perpendiculart/2right perpendicular nonequivalent Z(2)Z(4)-linear Hadamard codes of length 2(t). Moreover, the order of the monomial automorphism group for the Z(2)Z(4)-additive Hadamard codes and the permutation automorphism group of the corresponding Z(2)Z(4)-linear Hadamard codes are given.
paper_title: Classification of the Z(2)Z(4)-Linear Hadamard Codes and Their Automorphism Groups
